data.eml:eml: Catalogue of the Syrphidae of Egypt (Diptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article El-Hawagry, Magdi S., Gilbert, Francis (2019): Catalogue of the Syrphidae of Egypt (Diptera). Zootaxa 4577 (2): 201-248, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4577.2.1
